p: The impact of Aβ peptide on BDNF expression has been previously investigated by us [ 38] and others [ 89, 90] and, as also shown in this study, BDNF expression was found impaired upon intracerebroventricular Aβ1-42 delivery. More importantly, this study provides direct evidence of the beneficial effect of OmEO inhalation regarding BDNF expression in an AD-rat model.
